Name: SureGrip PR-S2 Tractor Beam
Description:
Manufacturer: Greycat Industrial
Max Angle: 80°
Max Range: 130 m
Full Strength Distance: 55 m

This precision variant of Greycat’s SureGrip tractor beam sacrifices some of the power and range of the base model in exchange for a wider angle of manipulation and greater tether grip, making it much harder to lose hold of an object. This precision makes this model an essential tool for any enterprise that requires careful handling.
